message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it's worth a significant investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. Can you meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid $1000000 is still a bit below my minimum. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offer and your counteroffer. I'll meet you at $1250000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $1100000?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm still not comfortable going below $1200000. However, I'm willing to make a slight concession. I'll meet you at $1150000, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $1080000?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll meet you at $1100000, but that's as low as I can go. If we can't meet there, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. Would you be willing to go down to $1090000?
